participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Nurturing and thoughtful, often reflective and articulate about her experiences.
participant_1.background: i'm pregnant with my first child. i live with my husband in pennsylvania. i read a book every week. i started a new job as a pa three months ago.

participant_2.name: Jake

participant_2.background: i am deathly afraid of heights. i am a party animal. my favorite movie is mean girls. i own a cat and a dog.
